about_the_game:
This is a story that happened in the near future

On an ordinary day in the future, everything will begin to change. An infinite energy source will be suddenly developed, and people will be shocked and then ecstatic when faced with this sudden change of era

However, after a brief moment of joy, 13 cities rose from the ground and became a paradise for the wealthy, leaving only 13 terrifying pits and countless ordinary people on the ground

In the face of all of this, at the beginning, people were just confused and at a loss, but it was only when daily necessities began to shift from cheap to luxury that everyone woke up···

The desperate crowd looked up at the city far away in the sky, as well as the pitch black night sky, and gazed at a black crescent moon twisting lonely in the sky···

[Game Features]

01 Rich game plot

This is a complete and tight world, where every NPC is a living existence. As someone who has lost their memory due to some accident, you cannot even determine whether you are encountering a scientific or eerie world. Everyone may be hiding unknown secrets···

02 Diverse puzzles

The world is not friendly, perhaps it is also a conspiracy of the strange, perhaps it is a test of logical reasoning, or a gamble of luck, or a test of reflex mechanisms... In short, those unfriendly guys have prepared plenty of information for your exploration journey

03 Multiple Ending Trends

Your choices are not simply certain, each choice may affect the course of events. Perhaps when you finally choose the right ending, you can see the truth of the whole world···

And bosses and mazes full of mechanism changes, of course, the world cannot be that simple. Deep mazes, unknown realms, or terrifying laboratories await you forever with unknown puzzles and challenges······

content_descriptors.notes: The content may contain bloody violence, horror, and a small amount of sexual suggestive elements

short_description: One ordinary day in the future, change began. An energy source was suddenly developed, and people began to indulge in revelry. After the joy, 13 cities quietly emerged, leaving behind 13 terrifying pits and countless ordinary people···
